item.description: How to make a self-signed TLS certificate: #!/usr/bin/env bash # stolen from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10175812/how-to-generate-a-self-signed-ssl-certificate-using-openssl openssl \ req -x509 \ -newkey rsa:4096 \ -keyout key.pem \ -out cert.pem \ -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -subj '/CN=localhost'
